name: src/cr/calendar-round.js
CalendarRound
description: A combination of 260-day cycles and the Haab cycle.

params.name: tzolkinDay
params.description: Name of the name in the 260-day cycle

name: tzolkin
description: 260-day cycle component of the Calendar Round

name: haab
description: Haab cycle component of the Calendar Round

name: validate
description:
Validate that the Calendar Round has a correct 260-day and Haab
configuration

name: next
description: Increment both the Haab and 260-day cycle to the next day in the Calendar Round

name: equal
description:
Check that this CalendarRound matches another CalendarRound. If one CR has
wildcards and the other does not, this function will return false.

name: match
description:
Check that this Calendar Round matches another CalendarRound. If one CR has
wildcards and the other does not, this function will return true.

name: shift
description:
Shift a CalendarRound fullDate forward through time. Does not modify this
object and will return a new object.

name: isPartial
description: Return true, if this function has any wildcard portions.

name: toString
description: Render the CalendarRound cycle fullDate as a string

name: getCalendarRound
description: Return a comparable instance of a Calendar Round.

name: src/cr/haab-month.js

types: {"undefined": *, "Pop": number, "Wo": number, "Sip": number, "Sotz'": number, "Sek": number, "Xul": number, "Yaxk'in": number, "Mol": number, "Ch'en": number, "Yax": number, "Sak": number, "Keh": number, "Mak": number, "K'ank'in": number, "Muwan": number, "Pax": number, "K'ayab": number, "Kumk'u": number, "Wayeb": number}

name: getHaabMonth
description: Return a comparable HaabMonth instantiation.

name: HaabMonth
description: Describes only the month component of a Haab fullDate

name: name
description: Name of the Haab month

name: next
description: Return the next month in the Haab cycle

name: validate
description:
Ensure a Haab month name is defined, and that the month name is within the
set of allowable values.

name: shift
description:
Shift a HaabMonth fullDate forward through time. Does not modify this
object and will return a new object.

params.name: increment
params.description: Number of months to move forward

name: toString
description: Render this month as a string

name: src/cr/haab.js
getHaab
description: Return a comparable HaabMonth instantiation.

name: Haab
description: Describes a Haab fullDate with a position and a month
examples: let day = new Haab(8, new HaabMonth("Kumk'u"));

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: coeff
params.description: The position in the Haab month for this fullDate

name: private_next
description: Lazy loaded instance of the next Haab date in the cycle

name: validate
description: Ensure the Haab's coefficients are within range and the month is defined

name: next
description: Return the next day in the Haab cycle

name: equal
description:
Ensure this Haab object has the same configuration as another Haab object.
Does not take wildcards into account.

name: match
description:
Ensure this Haab object has a matching configuration as another Haab object.
Takes wildcards into account.

name: name
description: Return a string representation of the Haab month name

name: toString
description: Render the Haab fullDate as a string

days

name: name
description: Name of the day in the 260-day cycle

name: day_position
description: Index of the day in the list of Tzolkin' days

name: private_next
description: Lazy loaded instance of the next Tzolkin Day in the cycle

name: validate
description:
Ensure the Tzolk'in day name is defined and is within the list of
acceptable day names.

name: next
description: Return the next day in the 260-day cycle

name: toString
description: Return the name of this Tzolkin day

getTzolkin

name: Tzolkin
description: Describes a fullDate in the 260-day cycle with a position and a day
examples: let day = new Tzolkin(4, new TzolkinDay("Ajaw"));

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: private_next
description: Lazy loaded instance of the next Tzolkin date in the cycle

name: next
description: Return the next day in the 260-day cycle

name: validate
description: Ensure the Tzolkin's coefficients are within range and the day is defined

name: equal
description:
Ensure this Tzolkin object has the same configuration as another Tzolkin
object. Does not take wildcards into account.

name: match
description:
Ensure this Tzolkin object has a matching configuration as another Tzolkin
object. Takes wildcards into account.

description: Render the 260-day cycle fullDate as a string

Factory

description: Define properties to be override by sub-classes

description: Describes how to break a string into a fullDate element

name: split
description: Split the provided fullDate into its components

name: src/factory/calendar-round.js
CalendarRoundFactory

examples: let cr = new CalendarRoundFactory().parse("4 Ajaw 8 Kumk'u");

name: constructor
description: Defines the pattern describing a Calendar Round

name: pattern
description: Describes how to break the string into a Calendar Round

name: parse
description: Given a string, parse it and create a Calendar Round

params.name: raw
params.description: A string containing a Calendar Round

name: src/factory/full-date.js
FullDateFactory
description:
Given a fullDate composed of a Long Count and a Calendar Round, create a
{FullDate} object.

FullDate

name: src/lc/index.js

LongCount

params.name: cycles
params.description:
Components in the long count
(eg, K'in, Winal, Bak'tun, etc)

name: parts
description: Date Components

name: date_pattern
description: Pattern to validate the fullDate

name: correlationConstant
description: Correlation constant to allow alignment with western calendars

name: setCorrelationConstant
description: Chainable method to set the correlation constant

name: julianDay
description: Return a representation of this Long Count in Julian Days.

name: isPositive
description: Return true if the Long Count is positive.

name: isNegative
description: Return true if the Long Count is operating as a negative Distance Number.

name: isPositive
description: Set this Long Count as being a Long Count or a positive Distance Number

name: isNegative
description: Set this Long Count as being a negative Distance Number

name: equal
description: Given two long count dates, check if they are equal

name: clone
description: Create a copy object of this long count fullDate

name: getDateSections
description: Get specific column in Long Count fullDate

name: setDateSections
description: Set specific column in Long Count fullDate

name: map
description: Pass the map down to the parts

name: lt
description: Compare if this LC is greater than the supplied LC.

name: gt
description: Compare is this LC is less than the supplied LC.

name: kIn
description: Set the k'in component of the fullDate

name: kIn
description: Return the k'in component of the fullDate

name: winal

name: winal
description: Return the winal component of the fullDate

name: tun
description: Set the tun component of the fullDate

name: tun
description: Return the tun component of the fullDate

name: kAtun

name: kAtun
description: Return the k'atun component of the fullDate

name: bakTun

name: bakTun
description: Return the bak'tun component of the fullDate

name: piktun

name: piktun
description: Return the piktun component of the fullDate

name: kalabtun
description: Set the kalabtun component of the fullDate

name: kalabtun
description: Return the kalabtun component of the fullDate

name: kinchiltun
description: Set the kinchiltun component of the fullDate

name: kinchiltun
description: Return the kinchiltun component of the fullDate

name: isValid
description: Ensure the fullDate has only numbers and wildcards separated by points.

name: isPartial
description:
Returns true if any of the positions in the Long Count have been assigned
a {Wildcard} object.

name: getPosition
description: Count the number of days since 0.0.0.0.0 for this LC.

name: plus
description: Return the sum of this Long Count and the supplied

name: minus
description: Return the difference between this Long Count and the supplied

name: toString
description: Convert the LongCount to a string and pad the sections of the fullDate

name: src/lc/night/lord-of-night.js
LordOfNight
description:
Describes one of the 9 Lords of the night.
This class is accessible through its instantiated values, or the get()
method.

name: id
description: Number of the Lord of the Night

name: toString
description: Represent the Lord of the night as a string G1..G9.

name: get
description: Return a Lord of the Night by its G id.

name: src/operations/calendar-round-iterator.js
CalendarRoundIterator
description:
Used to iterate through the entire cycle of 18,980 days for the full
permutation of Haab and 260-day count.

name: reset
description: Reset this iterator so that it can be reused.

name: next
description: Move to the next position in the iterator or end the iteration.

types: {value: null, done: boolean}|{value: CalendarRound, done: boolean}

name: src/operations/calendar-round-wildcard.js
iter
description: A reusable singleton instance of the CalendarRoundIterator

name: CalendarRoundWildcard
description:
Given a Calendar Round with a wildcard, calculate all possible matching
fully qualified Calendar Rounds.

name: run
description: Run calculation to find all fully qualified Calendar Rounds

name: src/operations/fulldate-wildcard.js
FullDateWildcard
description:
Given a Calendar Round and Long Count with a wildcard, calculate all possible
matching fully qualified Long Counts with CalendarRounds.

name: run
description: Run calculation to find all fully qualified Long Counts with Calendar Rounds

LongCountWildcard

Given a Long Count with a wildcard, calculate all possible matching fully

name: src/wildcard.js
Wildcard
description:
Describes a wildcard in the Calendar Round or Long Count.
This class is not directly exposed to the user. There is a singleton in this
library to allow for use and equality comparison.

name: toString
description: Represent the Wildcard as a string. ie, '*'.
